boardgame.name: Samarkand
Samarkand: Routes to Riches
Samarkand: Wege zum Reichtum
boardgame.description: As members of merchant families in Samarkand: Routes to Riches, the players marry into other wealthy merchant families. They expand the trading routes of these families and establish trade relationships with other families. The player who gains the most victory points with relationships and goods will be the winner at the end of the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each turn, the players either marry into a merchant family or expand the trading route of a family they are already married into._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;To marry into a family, the player pays the cost of the family. Only two players may marry into each family. To expand the trading route of a family, the player must be married into the family and may pay for the route with the money of the family. The goal is to meet other families not met before (gaining trade relationship markers) and to reach goods spaces first (gaining goods tokens)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;When all families have established at least one trade relationship or one family has established five trade relationships, the game ends. Each player scores their goods cards with the corresponding goods markers they have acquired, the trade relationship markers they have collected, and their money._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This entry has been split from the Winsome Games publication Age of Scheme: Routes to Riches. As the rules have been altered, number of players differs, and updates to the artwork have been made, the two games are regarded as separate entities._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgameissuearticle: Not a Matter of Love, But Marriages Abound
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Samarkand: Routes to Riches – Family Connection
boardgame.boardgameimplementation: Age of Scheme: Routes to Riches

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Complete, excellent condition. Shipping is $12. Combined shipping rates are available when ordering multiple games.

New in Shrink. £7.79 postage to UK. This is the international edition and contains English rules as standard I will ship worldwide (please ask, if outside the UK, for a shipping quote before ordering), combine orders for cheaper postage and will give a 2.5% discount for purchases over £50 and 5% for purchases over £100. All items (750+ unique games) I list are in stock and will be posted within 24 working hours of payment being received.

Queen Games - Samarkand Language: Dutch, English, French, Italian, German _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Spanish Players: 2 to 5 Age: 8+ Duration: about 45 min Weight: 1.850 kg New - mint condition - unopened - still in shrink wrap. Theme: Rich merchants and their families ply the Silk Route of the Orient with their caravans in order to make lucrative business. The players assume the role of traders who marry into other families to extend their influences. Who will be the richest merchant? Samarkand is a family game with its simple to understand rules and fast access to play. See Details (more info) or below for complete selling, payment and shipping conditions.
